TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultExpressionVisitor extends System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionVisitor`1<class System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression>

Docs.summary: Visits each element of an expression tree from a given root expression. If any element changes, the tree is rebuilt back to the root and the new root expression is returned; otherwise the original root expression is returned.
